name: ESP32_Complete_Board
description: Main hierarchical circuit - ESP32-S3 complete development board

D1.description: Very low capacitance ESD protection diode, 2 data-line, SOT-666

U1.description: 1A Low Dropout regulator, positive, 3.3V fixed output, SOT-223

U2.description: RF Module, ESP32-S3 SoC, Wi-Fi 802.11b/g/n, Bluetooth, BLE, 32-bit, 3.3V, onboard antenna, SMD

J2.description: Generic connector, single row, 01x04, script generated (kicad-library-utils/schlib/autogen/connector/)

annotations.text: Main hierarchical circuit - ESP32-S3 complete development board
